A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Many Characters\, Old & New\, All Fighting For Screen-Time Leaves Us Chopping & Changing\, Being Pulled So Many Places At Once. It Is A Struggle To Take It All In\, But It Did Not Leave Me Drastically Disappointed. Many Action Sequences\, Rescues\, Love Interests\, Losses\, Defeats & Triumphs All Culminate For A Fantastic Adventure Ride. The Swashbuckling Nature Of This Saga Builds Characters\, Old & New\, Further. But Some Characters Have So Little Back Story (Snoke For Instance) It Is Hard To Understand How The Federation (& Dark Side) Ever Became So Powerful Again?? (With Dreadnoughts & Super Star Destroyers Etc) I Thought More Would Be Explained On This\, But Other Than The Luke / Kylo Fall-Out Argument At The Temple\, There Is Nothing Further Added..It's A Bit Disappointing\, Because Then All Hell Breaks Lose When Characters We Know Little To Nothing About All Start Either Being Knocked Off\, Or Become Incredibly Powerful & Rise Up Against This Almighty Power. You Cannot Just Ride The Story On The Back (History) Of Luke & Leia's Demise\, With No Further Depth To Any Other Characters We Are Expected To Adopt In This New Saga. So The Saga Loses Steam Here\, & All The CGi\, Character Cameo's By Chewie\, C3PO & R2D2 Cannot Add In Enough Weight-Laughs\, But It Is Still A Quite Enjoyable Ride. Which I Guess Is The Ultimate Goal...Merchandise!!! Merchandise!!! Meeerrrchandise!!!! Particularly For All The New\, Soon-To-Be Female Fans Loving All These Female Heroes..Saving The Boys\, (Ie. Luke or Solo) Whom Are Old?? Outdated?? Where To Next I Wonder..-Sigh-
